content:
Q: Are adventure activities and indoor / outdoor sports covered by Travel Protect360 insurance?
A: No. Our travel insurance does not cover adventure activities. You can find the list of exclusions in our policy wording.
questions: Does Travel Protect360 insurance cover adventure activities?
Are indoor or outdoor sports included in the Travel Protect360 insurance coverage?
What activities are excluded from Travel Protect360 insurance?
Can I get coverage for adventure activities with Travel Protect360 insurance?
Where can I find the list of exclusions for Travel Protect360 insurance?
Is there any travel insurance from Travel Protect360 that includes adventure sports?
What should I check in the policy wording of Travel Protect360 insurance?
Are there any sports covered by Travel Protect360 insurance?
How do I know if my activity is covered by Travel Protect360 insurance?
Does Travel Protect360 provide a specific policy for sports coverage?
